label: DSC12
info_overview: The Aeon Labs Micro SES is a binary power switch device based on Zwave enhanced slave library V5.02P3.
category_description: Any device attached to the wall that controls a binary status of something, for ex. a light switch

parameters.label: Enable Automated sending of a Report
parameters.description: Automated sending of a Report triggered by minimal change of value.
parameters.overview: Automated sending of a Report triggered by minimal change of value.

parameters.description: Which reports need to send automatically in timing intervals for group 1
parameters.overview: Which reports need to send automatically in timing intervals for group 1

parameters.description: Which reports need to send automatically in timing intervals for group 2
parameters.overview: Which reports need to send automatically in timing intervals for group 2

xml.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<thing:thing-descriptions bindingId="zwave"
  xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
  xmlns:thing="http://eclipse.org/smarthome/schemas/thing-description/v1.0.0"
  xsi:schemaLocation="http://eclipse.org/smarthome/schemas/thing-description/v1.0.0
                      http://eclipse.org/smarthome/schemas/thing-description/v1.0.0">
  <thing-type id="aeon_dsc12_00_000">
    <label>DSC12 Micro Smart Energy Switch</label>
    <description>Micro Smart Energy Switch</description>

    <!-- CHANNEL DEFINITIONS -->
    <channels>
    </channels>

    <!-- DEVICE PROPERTY DEFINITIONS -->
    <properties>
      <property name="vendor">Aeon Labs</property>
      <property name="model">DSC12</property>
      <property name="manufacturerId">0086</property>
      <property name="manufacturerRef">0003:000C</property>
    </properties>

    <config-description>

      <!-- PARAMETER DEFINITIONS -->
      <parameter-group name="configuration">
        <context>setup</context>
        <label>Configuration Parameters</label>
      </parameter-group>
      <parameter name="config_2_2" type="integer" groupName="configuration"
                 min="0" max="65535">
        <label>2: Make Micro Smart Switch 2nd Edition Blink</label>
        <description><![CDATA[
This is a double byte value. The LSB defines the total time the device need to blink. The value if set in seconds. The MSB defines the on/off interval of the blinking. The unit is 0.1 s.    !]]></description>
        <default>0</default>
      </parameter>

      <parameter name="config_3_1" type="integer" groupName="configuration"
                 min="0" max="255">
        <label>3: Current Overload Protection</label>
        <description><![CDATA[
Load will be closed when current more that 15.5A and time more than 2 minutes    !]]></description>
        <default>0</default>
        <options>
          <option value="0">Deactivate</option>
          <option value="1">Activate</option>
        </options>
      </parameter>

      <parameter name="config_80_1" type="integer" groupName="configuration"
                 min="0" max="255">
        <label>80: Notification on Status Change</label>
        <description><![CDATA[
Parameter to Enable to send notification to associated devices (Group 1) when the state of Micro Smart Switch's load changed    !]]></description>
        <default>0</default>
        <options>
          <option value="0">Deactivate</option>
          <option value="1">Hail CC Sent</option>
          <option value="2">Basic CC Report Sent</option>
        </options>
      </parameter>

      <parameter name="config_90_1" type="integer" groupName="configuration"
                 min="0" max="255">
        <label>90: Automated sending of a Report triggered by minimal change of value.</label>
        <description><![CDATA[
Parameter to Enable/Disable automated sending of a Report triggered by minimal change of value.    !]]></description>
        <default>0</default>
        <options>
          <option value="0">Deavtivate</option>
          <option value="1">Activate</option>
        </options>
      </parameter>

      <parameter name="config_91_2" type="integer" groupName="configuration"
                 min="0" max="65535">
        <label>91: Minimum Change to send Report (Watt)</label>
        <description><![CDATA[
The value represents the minimum change in Wattage for a Report to be sent.    !]]></description>
        <default>25</default>
      </parameter>

      <parameter name="config_92_1" type="integer" groupName="configuration"
                 min="0" max="255">
        <label>92: Minimum Change to send Report (%)</label>
        <description><![CDATA[
The value represents the minimum change in Watage Percent for a report to be sent.    !]]></description>
        <default>5</default>
      </parameter>

      <parameter name="config_101_4" type="integer" groupName="configuration"
                 min="0" max="65535">
        <label>101: Which reports need to send automatically in timing intervals for group 1</label>
        <description><![CDATA[
The value is a combination number made up of the sum of the values for the individual parameters.
                                                        The parameters have the values: KWH=8, Wattage=4, Current=2, Voltage=1.
                               !]]></description>
        <default>4</default>
      </parameter>

      <parameter name="config_102_4" type="integer" groupName="configuration"
                 min="0" max="65535">
        <label>102: Which reports need to send automatically in timing intervals for group 2</label>
        <description><![CDATA[
The value is a combination number made up of the sum of the values for the individual parameters.
                                                        The parameters have the values: KWH=8, Wattage=4, Current=2, Voltage=1.
                               !]]></description>
        <default>8</default>
      </parameter>

      <parameter name="config_103_4" type="integer" groupName="configuration"
                 min="0" max="65535">
        <label>103: Which reports need to send automatically in timing intervals for group 3</label>
        <description><![CDATA[
The value is a combination number made up of the sum of the values for the individual parameters.
                                                        The parameters have the values: KWH=8, Wattage=4, Current=2, Voltage=1.
                               !]]></description>
        <default>0</default>
      </parameter>

      <parameter name="config_111_4" type="integer" groupName="configuration"
                 min="1" max="2678400">
        <label>111: Interval to send out reports of group 1</label>
        <description></description>
        <default>3</default>
      </parameter>

      <parameter name="config_112_4" type="integer" groupName="configuration"
                 min="1" max="2678400">
        <label>112: Interval to send out reports of group 2</label>
        <description></description>
        <default>600</default>
      </parameter>

      <parameter name="config_113_4" type="integer" groupName="configuration"
                 min="1" max="2678400">
        <label>113: Interval to send out reports of group 3</label>
        <description></description>
        <default>600</default>
      </parameter>

      <parameter name="config_120_1" type="integer" groupName="configuration"
                 min="0" max="255">
        <label>120: Turn External Button Mode</label>
        <description><![CDATA[
Parameter to set External button type    !]]></description>
        <default>255</default>
        <options>
          <option value="0">Momentary Button Mode</option>
          <option value="1">2 State Switch Mode</option>
          <option value="2">3 Way Switch Mode</option>
        </options>
      </parameter>

      <!-- ASSOCIATION DEFINITIONS -->
      <parameter-group name="association">
        <context>link</context>
        <label>Association Groups</label>
      </parameter-group>
      <parameter name="group_1" type="integer" groupName="association"  multiple="true">
        <label>1: Target for automatic meter reports</label>
        <description></description>
        <multipleLimit>5</multipleLimit>
      </parameter>

      <parameter name="group_2" type="integer" groupName="association"  multiple="true">
        <label>2: Target for automatic reports</label>
        <description></description>
        <multipleLimit>5</multipleLimit>
      </parameter>

    </config-description>

  </thing-type>
</thing:thing-descriptions>

<Product>

    </CommandClasses>

            <Minimum>0</Minimum>
            <Maximum>65535</Maximum>
            <Size>2</Size>
        </Parameter>
